column1: Appendix table 4. Characteristics of adults on probation, 2000, 2015, and 2016
Report title: Probation and Parole in the United States, 2016   NCJ 251148
Data source:  Bureau of Justice Statistics, , Annual Probation Survey, 2000, 2015, and 2016.
Appendix table 4. Characteristics of adults on probation, 2000, 2015, and 2016
Note: Characteristics are based on probationers with a known status. Detail may not sum to total due to rounding.
a/Excludes persons of Hispanic or Latino origin, unless specified.
b/Includes violent and property offenses in 2000 because those data were not collected separately.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Annual Probation Survey, 2000, 2015, and 2016.
